definition: house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)

sentences.english: In the intensive care unit, beam aunt continue to talk to her mother that year.
sentences.chinese: 重症病房里，梁大妈继续跟马母说着当年的事。

sentences.english: The atmosphere on an inpatient ward is tense because of this exerted energy.
sentences.chinese: 由于这种表露的干劲，住院病房的氛围很紧张。

sentences.english: First Affiliated Hospital of Harbin Medical University, Department of Respiratory Medicine, deputy director of the Second Ward.
sentences.chinese: 哈尔滨医科大学附属第一医院呼吸内科二病房副主任。

sentences.english: I met Connie the day she was admitted to the hospice room, where I worked as a volunteer.
sentences.chinese: 我是在康妮住进收容所病房的那天见到她的。

sentences.english: The bill was sent to her room.
sentences.chinese: 当医药费通知单送到她的病房时，她不敢看。

sentences.english: The old chart should accompany the patient from the ER to the patient ward where he's admitted.
sentences.chinese: 旧病历应伴着病人从急诊室送人病房。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate status of sleep of rooming-in periods puerpera and its relative factors.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解母婴同室病房产妇的睡眠状况及相关因素。

sentences.english: Tang sugar ask cheng superior the cuff links in ward who lost.
sentences.chinese: 唐糖在病房里问程超群那个袖扣到底是谁丢的。

sentences.english: As she talked she led him into the ICU.
sentences.chinese: 这样边说边走，就把他带进加护病房去了。

sentences.english: Dressed in his doctor's gown he went in to see her.
sentences.chinese: 身穿医生大褂的凯利医生来到病房看她。

sentences.english: The doctor came to ward TianXin Suggestions after surgery in the mounting bracket.
sentences.chinese: 医生来到病房后建议田心手术治疗在安装支架。

sentences.english: This is the prescription for your discharged medicines. Please go to Satellite Pharmacy to receive your medicine.
sentences.chinese: 这是住院出院带药处方签，请至病房卫星药局领药。

sentences.english: Arrange cups in medication preparation area or move medication cart to position outside client's room.
sentences.chinese: 在药物准备区备好杯子，或将药车推到病房外。

sentences.english: Anna moved into the general ward from the sterile chamber.
sentences.chinese: 安娜从无菌室搬进普通病房。

sentences.english: The patient lives in a white room.
sentences.chinese: 那个病人住在无尘病房。

to leave hospital/to be discharged from hospital
to look after a hospitalized loved one
